fno: Turnover on the National Stock Exchange's futures & options (F&O) segment was Rs 212.26 lakh crore compared with Rs 124.23 lakh crore reported in the previous session. In the cash market, the Nifty 50 slipped 258.60 points or 1.49% to settle at 17,154.30. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, climbed 20.89% to 16.22. IndusInd Bank, Reliance Industries (RIL) and ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The March 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 29 March 2023.
